Uses of Interface
com.indeed.status.core.Dependency

    • Uses of Dependency in com.indeed.status.core

      Classes in com.indeed.status.core that implement Dependency 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractDependency
      The AbstractDependency provides a convenience base class for implementers of the Dependency interface.
      class  ComparableDependency<T extends Comparable<T>> 
      class  DependencyPinger
      The DependencyPinger is a modification of the HCv2 ServicePinger class that keeps the idea of consecutive failures and slowly downgrading status, but uses abstractions from the HCv3 system.
      class  PingableDependency
      The PingableDependency represents the simplest of dependencies, a dependency that executes and either completes or throws an Exception.
      class  SimpleDependency
      The SimpleDependency represents the most common form of dependency with a tiered result level.
      class  SimplePingableDependency
      Simple pingable dependency that determines health status by evaluating an injected PingMethod that either runs to completion or throws an exception.
      Methods in com.indeed.status.core that return Dependency 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Dependency DependencyPinger.getDependency() 
      Dependency AbstractDependencyManager.getDependency(String id)

      Triggered each and every time the status of a dependency is checked.

      void AbstractDependencyManager.onChecked(Dependency source, CheckResult result) 
      protected void AbstractStatusUpdateListener.onDegraded(Dependency dependency, CheckResult original, CheckResult updated)
      Triggered when the given dependency has fallen out of OK status.
      protected void AbstractStatusUpdateListener.onDisabled(Dependency dependency, CheckResult original, CheckResult updated)
      Triggered when the given dependency has entered a full outage state.
      protected void AbstractStatusUpdateListener.onImproved(Dependency dependency, CheckResult original, CheckResult updated)
      Triggered when the given dependency has improved but is still not OK.
      protected void AbstractStatusUpdateListener.onRestored(Dependency dependency, CheckResult original, CheckResult updated)
      Triggered when the given dependency has returned to OK status.
      protected void AbstractStatusUpdateListener.onStarted(Dependency dependency, CheckResult original, CheckResult updated)
      Triggered when the given dependency has first started.
      protected void AbstractStatusUpdateListener.onWorsened(Dependency dependency, CheckResult original, CheckResult updated)
      Triggered when the given dependency has gotten worse.
